# tds-tag



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                          | Type                                                                                                | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `modeVariant` | `mode-variant` | Sets the variant mode of the tag     | `"Error" \| "Information" \| "Inherit from parent" \| "Neutral" \| "New" \| "Success" \| "Warning"` | `'Neutral'` |
| `size`        | `size`         | Sets the size of the tag             | `"Large" \| "Small"`                                                                                | `'Large'`   |
| `text`        | `text`         | The title text to display in the tag | `string`                                                                                            | `''`        |


## Slots

| Slot     | Description                              |
| -------- | ---------------------------------------- |
| `"icon"` | Slot used to display an Icon in the Tag. |
